product_name: NRS Mayra Inflatable Stand Up Paddle Board - Women's - 10' 6"
long_description: The Mayra brings fitness-minded women an inflatable board designed with more deck space and stability for better workouts on the water. SUP yoga fans and fitness paddlers will love this design.
